meaningMnemonic: Something <kanji>big</kanji> in <kanji>width</kanji> is <vocabulary>large</vocabulary>. In fact, it's of a pretty <vocabulary>substantial</vocabulary> size. This word is used to describe a large magnitude or degree of change, increase, decrease, or difference in a given situation.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
